WorkItem.Description:
How do  I  use regex to  extract  the city state and zip from a city,state zip address line
San Franciso, CA 00000
Birmingham, AL 00000
Mobile,AL 00000

I  was hoping to  get  and array of

array[0] = city
array[1] = state
array[2]= zip


Thanks
WorkItem.Summary: extract  the city sate and zip (c#)
